com.alexkasko.netty.ftp

Class CrlfStringDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler
      • org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.frame.FrameDecoder
        • com.alexkasko.netty.ftp.CrlfStringDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelUpstreamHandler

    public class CrlfStringDecoder
extends org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.frame.FrameDecoder
    FrameDecoder implementation, that accumulates input strings until \r\n and sends accumulated string upstream.
    Author:
    alexkasko Date: 12/28/12
